Articles.Content: hey everyone, i don't find a way to download the latest version of parttools, to create my own cockpit ! some have a solution?
Welcome to the forum @kirksland, your question has been moved from KSP discussion (which is mostly about vanilla KSP) to add-on development, a great place to get help when creating mods.
Were you signed in to the forum when you tried to download? Something changed and it appears you now need to be sign in to get the downloads.
